0.1.name: wordpress/page2cat
0.1.description:
Category Pages & Posts Shortcodes offers helpful shortcodes to display a post or page content, or a list of posts. It also allow an exclusive relationship between a Category and a Page, in order to display the page content as "header" of category archives, with a simple php tag.

You can safely use shortcodes inside a post or a page, you can embed them in your templates or in your sidebar using the do_shortcode WordPress function, like that:

<?php do_shortcode('[showsingle <options>"]'); ?>
  • Documentation and usage examples

  • Support Forum

  • GitHub repository
